# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int=10)
    io = IOBuffer()
    remaining = text_width
    is_first = true

    print_word(word) = begin
        if remaining == text_width && !is_first
            println(io)
        end

        print(io, word, ' ')
        is_first = false
        remaining -= length(word) + 1
    end

    for word in split(text)
        print_word(word)
    end

    return String(take!(io))
end

# Example
text = "Hello, this is a Julia programming question related to text wrapping."
result = wrap_string(text, 15)

@show result
